title: Baby leeks with tarragon
ingredients: ['15 g (½ oz) coarse Granary or white breadcrumbs', '2 eggs', '550 g (1¼ lb) baby leeks, halved lengthways', 'Tarragon vinaigrette', '3 tbsp groundnut oil', '2 tsp white wine vinegar', '1 tsp Dijon mustard', '1 tsp chopped fresh tarragon', 'salt and pepper']
